Departments

#### City Administrative Offices

We are devoted to maintaining and improving services for Childress citizens. If you need something and not sure where to look, we are a good start.  We are here and happy to help.

###### City Manager Kevin Hodges [khodges@childresstexas.gov](mailto:khodges@childresstexas.gov)
